SELECT
(CASE WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%生产' THEN '生产' END) as section, SC_PART as part,SC_CONTENT as content ,RESULT as result,ALTPID as level FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(TASKSTART_TM)
and devName='1#离心式鼓风机'
AND devName='1#鼓风机电机'
AND devName='1#离心式鼓风机稀油站' AND ( SC_CONTENT='油泵运转是否正常、给油量是否稳定、连续' OR SC_CONTENT='油站供油温度' OR SC_CONTENT='供油压力是否正常' OR SC_CONTENT='回油滤网有无堵塞' OR SC_CONTENT='供回油管、阀、接头是否漏油' OR SC_CONTENT='油泵压力是否正常')
AND devName='1#鼓风机1#稀油站电机'
AND devName='1#鼓风机2#稀油站电机'
AND devName='1#离心式鼓风机稀油站' AND ( SC_CONTENT='油箱内油质是否符合要求' OR SC_CONTENT='油箱油位是否在标准范围内' OR SC_CONTENT='油站油箱温度')
ORDER BY FIELD(section,'设备','电仪','生产'),part

SELECT
(CASE WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%生产' THEN '生产' END) as section, SC_PART as part,SC_CONTENT as content ,RESULT as result,ALTPID as level FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(TASKSTART_TM)
AND ((DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND devName=CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') AND SC_PART in ('轴承（上）','轴承（下）','皮带','主轴','电流','定子')) OR (DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND devName=CONCAT('二厂浮选电机',"${equip}") ) OR (DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND devName=CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') AND SC_PART='浮选机'))
AND ((DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND devName=CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') AND SC_PART NOT in ('轴承（上）','轴承（下）','皮带','主轴','电流','定子')) OR (DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND devName=CONCAT("${equip}",'浮选机') AND SC_PART NOT in('浮选机')))
ORDER BY FIELD(section,'设备','电仪','生产'),part
